titles.title: Commending the Florida Everblades hockey team for winning the 2024 East Coast Hockey League's Patrick J. Kelly Cup.
Commending the Florida Everblades hockey team for winning the 2024 East Coast Hockey League's Patrick J. Kelly Cup.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution commends the Florida Everblades hockey team for winning the 2024 Patrick J. Kelly Cup.
